front.title: Client Identifier Option in DHCP Server Replies

abstract.t: This document updates RFC2131 [RFC2131]. The changes to [RFC2131] defined in this draft clarifies the use of 'client identifier' option by the DHCP servers. The clarification addresses the issues arising out of the point specified by [RFC2131] that the server 'MUST NOT' return client identifier' option to the client. Requirements
